author: Grace Panetta
title: Americans, including a plurality of Republicans, oppose the anti-lockdown protests taking place across the country
description:
• The protests breaking out across the country aren't representative of the American public's views on coronavirus mitigation or their level of support for stay at home orders.
  • A YouGov and Yahoo News survey published on Monday found that 60% …
content: Over the weekend, a number of demonstrations protesting against states' stay-at-home orders and closures of non-essential businesses erupted in states including Texas, Colorado, Wisconsin, Minnesota, and Florida, with more taking place on Monday in Ohio, Kent… [+3550 chars]
